articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: Winston’s 50-year 4th of July fireworks tradition may not happen this year. With $25,000 still needed and little support so far, the event is at risk of being canceled. Community donations and volunteers are urgently needed to keep this celebration alive. Let’s not lose the 50th before it begins.
articles.title: A Community Tradition at Risk: Help Save Winston's 4th of July Fireworks
